title: Rekindling the Spark
goal: Eldrin undergoes a ritual or intense training to regain a significant portion of his lost magical power, preparing him for the confrontation.
stakes_shift: Eldrin's increased power gives them a fighting chance against Valerius, but also draws more attention from the blight and its forces, making him a greater target.

bridge.from_prev: The group is in hiding, aware of Valerius's active pursuit.
bridge.to_next: The group initiates a public challenge to Valerius, forcing a direct confrontation and risking open conflict.

sections.title: The Ancient Ritual
sections.intent: Eldrin prepares for a dangerous ritual to reclaim his power, guided by ancient texts.

scenes.summary: Guided by Seraphina's research, Eldrin prepares for an arduous, ancient ritual to draw upon dormant ley lines and rekindle his full magical potential.
scenes.outcome: Eldrin begins a perilous ancient ritual to restore his full magical power.

sections.title: A Test of Will
sections.intent: Show the difficulty and danger of Eldrin's ritual, with his allies supporting him.

scenes.summary: Eldrin endures visions and immense magical strain during the ritual, his allies guarding the sanctuary and lending their emotional support.
scenes.outcome: Eldrin successfully completes the ritual, regaining a significant portion of his ancient power.

sections.title: Power Reborn
sections.intent: Eldrin emerges with renewed power, ready for the coming conflict.

scenes.summary: Eldrin emerges from the ritual, visibly stronger, his eyes alight with ancient power, ready to face Valerius.
scenes.outcome: Eldrin's powers are significantly restored, making him a formidable force.
